pages.text: Gazelles are passive creatures and can be found in the Savanna.$(br2)If just one Gazelle is attacked, the whole herd flees. Gazelles are very fast, so you will not be able to catch it easily.$(br2)On death, Gazelles may drop a Gazelle Horn. This can be used to upgrade a potion of $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/swiftness)$(/l)Swiftness II to Swiftness III$(/l).
You can use an $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Echolocator$(/l) to attract Gazelles
